No Words of Irritation--God desires your words to be life-giving. Not a word of irritation is to be 
                                                                           145
spoken. However provoked you may feel, keep back every word that would stir up the evil in another heart. Speech is a great talent; and God desires every one of you to reach the standard of Christlikeness. Let every word you speak bless and elevate.-- Ms 65, 1901.
